metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27760 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: In `GammaImage()` of /MagickCore/enhance.c, depending on the `gamma` value, it's possible to trigger a divide-by-zero condition when a crafted input file is processed by ImageMagick. This could lead to an impact to application availability. The patch uses the `PerceptibleReciprocal()` to prevent the divide-by-zero from occurring. This flaw affects ImageMagick versions prior to ImageMagick 7.0.8-68.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
